Nome Chomsky and BF Skinner were two of

predisposition is in the form of a
universal grammar which is a set of
innate rules that govern all human

the observation that children are able

easily even if they are exposed to very
little
imput Skinner on the other hand is a
behaviorist he believed that all
Behavior including language is learned

learn language by imitating the adults
around them chumsky and Skinner's
disagreement is often referred to as the
nature versus natur debate chsky
